name: renderkit/cookie-gate
title: Cookie Gate
description: Only shows its content after a specific cookie consent.

icon.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='1.5' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><rect x='3' y='11' width='18' height='11' rx='2'/><path d='M7 11V7a5 5 0 0110 0v4'/><path d='M9 16l2 2 4-4'/></svg>

fallbackText.default: Bitte akzeptiere die passenden Cookies, um diesen Inhalt zu sehen.
